Description: SQL Server Agent was unable to open the local event log.
A SQL Server job failed to run because the SQL Server Agent subsystem failed to load.
A process or a person attempted to start the SQL Server Agent service

Description: SQL Server Agent has shut down the SQL Server Agent service.
A specific job step caused SQL Server Agent to write an error to the Windows Application log. The log will show the specific job and job step.
